problem.display_name: Circular sector's length of an arc and area

text.p: 다음 표의 빈 칸에 알맞은 값을 써 넣어라.

to 0.9\textwidth | X[m,c] || X[m,c] | X[m,c] | X[m,c] | X[m,c] | X[m,c] | X[m,c] | X[m,c] | X[m,c] | X[m,c] | 육십분법 [mathjaxinline]-60\degree[/mathjaxinline] [mathjaxinline]45\degree[/mathjaxinline] [mathjaxinline]120\degree[/mathjaxinline] [mathjaxinline]180\degree[/mathjaxinline] [mathjaxinline]300\degree[/mathjaxinline]
호도법 [mathjaxinline]-\frac{\pi }{6}[/mathjaxinline] [mathjaxinline]\frac{\pi }{2}[/mathjaxinline] [mathjaxinline]\frac{4}{3}\pi[/mathjaxinline] [mathjaxinline]2\pi[/mathjaxinline]
